masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote: "There's something in our facility—looks like a tiny bear? It's got a flat cap and an ENORMOUS canteen. It's trying to fill up from our main tank while muttering about dehydration. It seems scared. Also it might be a tardigrade?"
masks-newgeneration-unofficial.requirementsText:
• Stop Puddles from contaminating the water supply
  • He seems panicked—approach carefully
  • Find out why he needs so much water
